Text: The Memory of Justice is a 1976 documentary film directed by Marcel Ophüls.
Triplets:<The Memory of Justice
1:
--------------------
Text: The Memory of Justice:  It explores the subject of atrocities committed in wartime and features Joan Baez, Karl Dönitz, Hermann Göring, Hans-Joachim Kulenkampff, Yehudi Menuhin, Albert Speer and Telford Taylor.
